name: dot-dom
description: A tiny (less than 512 byte) template engine that uses virtual DOM and some of react principles

scripts.build: cat src/dotdom.js | perl -0pe 's/BEGIN NPM-GLUE.*END NPM-GLUE//s' | ./node_modules/.bin/babili | tee dotdom.min.js | gzip -9 > dotdom.min.js.gz
scripts.build:uglify: cat src/dotdom.js | perl -0pe 's/BEGIN NPM-GLUE.*END NPM-GLUE//s' | ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle | tee dotdom.min.js | gzip -9 > dotdom.min.js.gz

author: Ioannis Charalampidis
